name: No Strings Attached (Zed_Technician)
description:
Somewhere on Zara Lane there exists a small, dimly-lit hotel.
Late one night, the proprietor's nap is abruptly cut short by a strange commotion coming from within one of the rooms.
After an unsuccessful attempt to ignore the issue, she is given a strange gift box which contains a single clue...
Can this puzzle be unraveled before it's too late?

* Note, due to unforeseen circumstances this game had to be shorter and less intensive than some previous ones.
It was put together in 1 week!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Like what I do and want to support the games?
Then please consider either donating here on Itch, or buying me a coffee!
Every bit helps!
Can't? That's fine too! Hope you enjoy the game anyways.  :)
